metadata.dcterms:title: Press articles on statewide mask orders in 33 US states
metadata.dcterms:creator: Jacobs, Philip
metadata.dcterms:description: This bibliographical data base containts references from US press articles. The topic is governors' orders in 33 states for wearing masks to reduce the spread of COVID-19. The newspaper articles describe details of the orders and identify who enforces these orders and whether these enforcers had expressed reservations about their roles.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Social Sciences
COVID-19
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: The enforcement of statewide mask wearing mandates to prevent COVID-19 in the US: an overview
